sentences.cn: 扎实的语法基本功训练

sentences.en: A sound knowledge of physics is fully as important as good grounding in chemistry.
sentences.cn: 完备的物理知识同化学中良好的基础训练一样重要.

sentences.en: All applicants for the job should have a basic grounding in computer skills.
sentences.cn: 所有申请这份工作的人都应具备基本的电脑操作能力.

sentences.en: Communication Power grounding system commonly used in the United earth grounding.
sentences.cn: 通信电源接地系统通常采用联合地线的接地方式.

sentences.en: Do not defeat the safety purpose of the grounding type plug.
sentences.cn: 不要忽视接地型插头的安全作用.

sentences.en: He has a good grounding in Chinese.
Illusion is a crutch for those with no grounding in reality.
sentences.cn: 在现实无法立足者,才会寻求幻影支撑.

sentences.en: In fact, such a thought had never had any grounding, even in Drouet's desires.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 和杜洛埃厮守一辈子的想法是毫无根据的, 甚至杜洛埃本人也没这种打算.

sentences.en: Objective : To probe into the grounding for diagnosis and delivery methods fetal macrosomia.
sentences.cn: 探讨巨大儿诊断依据和分娩方式.

sentences.en: Plastics cover, completely enclosed, without screws, requires no earth grounding.
sentences.cn: 全塑外壳, 完全密封, 无外加螺钉, 无需接地线路.

sentences.en: The BAC shaft grounding system comes in 5 standard versions.
sentences.cn: BAC的轴承接地系统源自5个标准版本.

sentences.en: The degree provides a thorough grounding in both mathematics and statistics.
sentences.cn: 该学位课程将为数学和统计学打下扎实的基础。

sentences.en: The other three grounding stations have been disabled.
sentences.cn: 另外三个接地站也被切断了电源.

sentences.en: They believe the soul is immortal, grounding this belief on the Divine nature of the human spirit.
sentences.cn: 基于对人类精神神圣性的信仰，他们认为灵魂是永恒的。

sentences.en: Those rods are channeled into four main grounding stations.
sentences.cn: 这些针将电引入四个主要的地下站.
